parameters: Icarus, it’s good to see you.
Forgive me, it wasn’t my intention.
Please, my child, have a seat.
Today is a happy, happy day.
But you wouldn’t know. You were too young.

you are not who you think.

Yes. How do I put this? You see Redberry’s
Police Force has not solved our city’s
problems. Not well enough anyways. What we
need is a leader. I can be that person.
I just need to seize the city, but that
is not a simple task. If my plans were
discovered I would be placed back in

capture them. Most refuse to join my
cause, and so they remain captive. Though
a few did come around and have joined my
I swear, no one's been harmed.
He had betrayed me! These men have done
nothing of the sort. They deserve a chance
to make the correct decision. Everyone
